title: ISCC Certificate (Demo Version)
description: A simplified ISCC certificate credential for demo purposes. Contains only essential information issued by an ISCC Certification Body (CB).

vct.description: The Verifiable Credential Type (VCT) for this ISCC demo certificate.

systemUserCertificate.description: The certificate ID as shown on the official ISCC PDF (may differ from the certificate number).

scheme.description: The ISCC scheme applicable to this certificate.

systemUserName.description: Official name of the certified company.

systemUserNumber.description: The official ISCC System User Number (SUN).

country.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code where the certificate applies.

certificationBody.description: Name of the ISCC-recognised Certification Body (CB) that issued this certificate.
